ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2

Class DispListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.VendingListener
      • ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.DispListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractHardwareListener, DisplayListener

    public class DispListener
extends VendingListener
implements DisplayListener
    This class is registered by VendingManager with hardware classes to listen for display events. The current and last message are stored and can be obtained by the public accessors. HANDLED EVENTS: messageChange NOTES: In the messageChange, the display that had the message changed is ignored for now.

        Description copied from interface: DisplayListener
        Event that announces that the message on the indicated display has changed.

        Parameters:
        display - The device on which the event occurred.
        oldMessage - The previous message on display.
        newMessage - The new message on display.
